abstract: James R Oestreich reviews performance by Chinese pianist Lang Lang at Metropolitan Museum of Art to usher in museum's latest exhibition China: Through the Looking Glass.
lead_paragraph: Lang Lang, a pianist who is a magnet for crowds also draws attention to the museum’s “China: Through the Looking Glass” exhibition.

headline.main: Review: Lang Lang at the Metropolitan Museum in the Service of Eastern Art
headline.print_headline: A Celebrity Pianist Lures Listeners ‘Through the Looking Glass’ to Chinese Art

snippet: Lang Lang, a pianist who is a magnet for crowds also draws attention to the museum’s “China: Through the Looking Glass” exhibition.
